title: How to Leave a Group Text on Samsung Galaxy

steps.title: Open your Samsung Galaxy's Messages App.
steps.content: Open your Samsung Galaxy's Messages App. It has an icon that resembles a speech bubble. Tap the icon on your Home screen or Apps menu.

steps.title: Tap and hold the group conversation you want to leave.
steps.content: Tap and hold the group conversation you want to leave. This displays a pop-up at the bottom of the screen.

steps.title: Tap Notifications .
steps.content: Tap Notifications . It's the first option in the menu at the bottom of the screen. It has an icon that resembles a bell with a line through it. This disables notifications so that you are no longer alerted when you receive messages from this group. Alternatively, you can open the group conversation, tap the icon with three vertical dots in the upper-right corner ( â‹® ). Then tap the bell icon in the lower-right corner of the menu. steps.title: Tap and hold the conversation again.
steps.content: Tap and hold the conversation again. This displays the same pop-up at the bottom of the screen again.

steps.title: Tap Delete.
steps.content: Tap Delete . It's the second button at the bottom of the screen. It has an icon that resembles a trashcan.

steps.title: Tap Delete.
steps.content: Tap Delete . This confirms that you want to delete the conversation and deletes it.

steps.title: Open your Samsung Galaxy's Messages App.
steps.content: Open your Samsung Galaxy's Messages App. It has an icon that resembles a speech bubble. Tap the icon on your Home screen or Apps menu.

steps.title: Tap a group conversation you want to leave.
steps.content: Tap a group conversation you want to leave. This displays a popup at the bottom of the screen.

steps.title: Tap a user that is constantly sending messages.
steps.content: Tap a user that is constantly sending messages. This displays the information page for that sender. If a sender is persistently sending group text messages that you don't want, you can block that number. This will block all messages from that sender. Make sure it's a sender that you don't need to hear from.

steps.title: Tap Block .
steps.content: Tap Block . It's the third button at the bottom of the screen. It has an icon that resembles a circle with a slash through it.

steps.title: Tap Block.
steps.content: Tap Block . This confirms that you want to block the number and blocks it. You will not receive any more text messages from that sender. If there is more than one sender in a group text that is constantly sending you text messages, you can block multiple users.
